maml:description.maml:para: Get-PBApiService does returns the Webservice Object. Result is similar to PowerShell CmdLet New-WebserviceProxy. Using the created Object it is possible to invoke the soap-API Methods directly without the use of the ProfitBricksSoapApi CmdLets. See also Example 1

dev:remarks.maml:para: The Example call does Invoke the GetAllDatacenters soap call . See also: http://www.profitbricks.com/de/en/iaas-developer-center/profitbricks-api/apidoc/GetDataCenterbyID.html

dataCenterId dataCenterName dataCenterVersion dataCenterVersionSpecified ------------ -------------- ----------------- -------------------------- bc8e3220-0668-4f4b-... Datacenter01 20 True 2ead9608-c1bc-d263-... Datacenter02 1 True

maml:description.maml:para: Opens the API Service uing the given credentials
Username used to open the API

dev:remarks.maml:para: Open the API using the given username and password credentials
Open the API using allready created PSCredentials. See also Get-Help Get-Credential
Open the API using the given usernam and password credentials. It is also possible to use the parameters as possitional parameters(without -parametername).
Open the API using allready created PSCredentials. See also Get-Help Get-Credential. It is also possible to use the parameter as possitional parameter (without -parametername).
